thread.title: Report: EU must formally warn Hungary over refugee crisis violations (Amnesty International USA)
thread.title_full: Report: EU must formally warn Hungary over refugee crisis violations (Amnesty International USA) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Report: EU must formally warn Hungary over refugee crisis violations (Amnesty International USA)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International USA ) The Hungarian government has invested more than 1OO million euros on razor-wire fencing and border controls to keep refugees and migrants out, triple the amount it spends yearly on receiving asylum
